channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Friends -- XAMPP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Friends -- XAMPP

item.title: CVE-2024-5055|2024-08-01T21:03:10.356Z -- apache%20friends -- xampp
item.description: Uncontrolled resource consumption vulnerability in XAMPP Windows, versions 7.3.2 and earlier. This vulnerability exists when XAMPP attempts to process many incomplete HTTP requests, resulting in resource consumption and system crashes.

item.title: CVE-2024-5055|2024-06-04T18:01:56.403Z -- apache%20friends -- xampp
item.description: Uncontrolled resource consumption vulnerability in XAMPP Windows, versions 7.3.2 and earlier. This vulnerability exists when XAMPP attempts to process many incomplete HTTP requests, resulting in resource consumption and system crashes.
